Articles.Content:
Hello everyone, I got this issue many times before, and I am blatantly tired of it. Everything was going fine, then I installed some extra mods with CKAN in addition to the mods I have now. I now can't click any button, I can't go into the VAB or SPH, tracking station etc. sometimes I magically can go in, but then when I press the 'exit' button, I can't come out. I tried all methods I could find online. I also got my backup quicksave, and replaced it as 'persistent.sfs' or whatever it is called. As I said I got this problem before, and what I did was restart my game and it would be fixed. However this time I got much farther in, I just learnt how to R & D, I flew by Duna, etc. I am really annoyed. I will post a link to a screenshot with the error log onto it, and will post my save.

Screenshot:http://imgur.com/MiptZZG

Save: https://www.dropbox.com/home?preview=persistent.sfs
Edit: Nevermind, I fixed it. If anyone else encounters the problem, I fixed it by re installing b9 aerospace which I de-installed previously.
